In Chronic Prostatitis ( CP ) Chronic Pelvic Pain Syndrome ( CPPS ) , men low urinary tract symptom , pelvic pain , sexual dysfunction decrease quality life . Little known cause CP/CPPS . DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label Study CC-10004 Chronic Prostatitis/Chronic Pelvic Pain Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Prostatitis common urologic diagnosis men age 50 third common diagnosis old men . In Chronic Prostatitis ( CP ) Chronic Pelvic Pain Syndrome ( CPPS ) , men low urinary tract symptom , pelvic pain , sexual dysfunction decrease quality life . Little known cause CP/CPPS . Likewise , definitive therapy exist CP/CPPS . Unlike bacterial prostatitis , clear infect organism determine , CP/CPPS always treat antibiotic . Due significant inflammatory nature CP/CPPS , prior therapy focus target inflammation . CC-10004 several study show inhibitor inflammatory mediator , may decrease pain experienced CP/CPPS .
DOC.criteria: Must male age ≥ 18 year time consent Must understand voluntarily sign informed consent form Male subject least 3 month symptom CP/CPPS ( pain pelvic area , penis , scrotum , perineum ) refractory therapy ( e.g . NSAIDS ) Must able adhere study visit schedule protocol requirement Diagnosis Chronic Prostatitis Chronic Prostatitis Symptom Index least 15/24 Must meet follow laboratory criterion : Hemoglobin > 9 g/dL Hematocrit ≥ 27 % White blood cell ( WBC ) count ≥ 3000 /mL ( ≥ 3.0 X 109/L ) < 20,000/mL ( < 20 X 109/L ) Platelets ≥ 100,000 /mL ( ≥ 100 X 109/L ) Serum creatinine ≤ 1.5 mg/dL ( ≤ 132.6 μmol/L ) Total bilirubin £ 2.0 mg/dL Aspartate transaminase ( AST ) serum glutamic oxaloacetic transaminase ( SGOT ) , alanine transaminase ( ALT ) serum glutamate pyruvic transaminase , ( SGPT ) , < 1.5x upper limit normal ( ULN ) Males ( include vasectomy ) must agree use barrier contraception ( latex condom ) engage sexual activity female capable become pregnant study medication 28 day take last dose study medication Subjects female . Subjects document positive urine culture within past three month Subjects duration symptom less three month Subjects genital infection within past three month Subjects clinical epididymitis within past three month Subjects know active prior genitourinary cancer include renal , ureteral , bladder prostate Subjects receive prior radiation abdominal pelvic area Subjects know bladder ureteral calculus Subjects unable complete void diary Subjects neutropenia ( ANC < 750/ mm3 ) Any condition , include presence laboratory abnormality , place subject unacceptable risk participate study confound ability interpret data study History active Mycobacterium tuberculosis infection ( subspecies ) within 3 year prior screen visit . Infections occur > 3 year prior entry must effectively treat . Positive Tuberculin skin test ( Mantoux test ) Clinically significant abnormality chest xray ( CXR ) screen Any clinically significant abnormality 12lead ECG screening Use investigational medication within 28 day prior randomization 5 halflives know ( whichever longer ) History malignancy within previous 5 year ( except treat basalcell skin carcinoma ( ) and/or few 3 treat squamouscell skin carcinoma ) Subjects currently take chemotherapeutic agent Positive human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B , hepatitis C laboratory test result indicate active infection screening . Subjects know history significant disease determine PI
